doc:
Red Buttons https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Red_Buttons 0 Red Buttons (born Aaron Chwatt; February 5, 1919 – July 13, 2006) was an American actor and comedian. He won an Oscar and a Golden Globe for his supporting role in the 1957 film Sayonara. Red_Buttons ( born Aaron_Chwatt ; February_5_,_1919 – July_13_,_2006 ) was an_American_actor_and_comedian . He won an_Oscar and a_Golden_Globe for his_supporting_role in the_1957_film_Sayonara .
